channel.title: Other way to get a booster?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Other way to get a booster?"

item.title: Re: Other way to get a booster?
item.content:encoded: McM confirmed in the Q&A that you still get a booster when you already have the Eleven Tails and need to fight the 11TRevenge, from the ElevenSnax booth at the Festival. As for using one then fighting a Phase- I know you're locked out of Kaiju fighting, but I am not sure about Phase fighting as well.

item.title: Re: Other way to get a booster?
item.content:encoded: I wonder, can I get a booster on 11th if I have Eleven Tails? Should I chose between them or I can take a boost and then summon a phase?

item.title: Re: Other way to get a booster?
item.content:encoded: Actually, you'll get one each month on the eleventh if you bother to get it. McM made getting one part of the Festival.

item.title: Re: Other way to get a booster?
item.content:encoded: I don't think there a legal way other than buying it from the karma store.
